summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 to 13 inclusive, and 16 to 26 inclusive, Block 10; and Lots 1 to 10 inclusive, Block 11, Horton's Second Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-73 and 17-46, respectively.
